bech32Prefix.description: The human readable address prefix for the chains using bech32.

name.description: A human readable name for the explorer.

url.description: The base URL for the explorer.

apiUrl.description: The base URL for requests to the explorer API.

apiKey.description: An API key for the explorer (recommended for better reliability).

family.description: The type of the block explorer. See ExplorerFamily for valid values.

blockExplorers.description: A list of block explorers with data for this chain

confirmations.description: Number of blocks to wait before considering a transaction confirmed.

reorgPeriod.description: Number of blocks before a transaction has a near-zero chance of reverting or block tag.

estimateBlockTime.description: Rough estimate of time per block in seconds.

chainId.description: The chainId of the chain. Uses EIP-155 for EVM chains

customGrpcUrls.description: Specify a comma separated list of custom GRPC URLs to use for this chain. If not specified, the default GRPC urls will be used.

email.description: The email address of the deployer.

deployer.description: Identity information of the deployer of a Hyperlane instance to this chain

displayNameShort.description: A shorter human-readable name of the chain for use in user interfaces.

domainId.description: The domainId of the chain, should generally default to `chainId`. Consumer of `ChainMetadata` should use this value or `name` as a unique identifier.

gasCurrencyCoinGeckoId.description: The ID on CoinGecko of the token used for gas payments.

gnosisSafeTransactionServiceUrl.description: The URL of the gnosis safe transaction service.

http.description: The HTTP URL of the RPC endpoint (preferably HTTPS).

concurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent RPC requests.

webSocket.description: The WSS URL if the endpoint also supports websockets.

maxBlockRange.description: The maximum range between block numbers for which the RPC can query data

minBlockNumber.description: The absolute minimum block number that this RPC supports.

maxBlockAge.description: The relative different from latest block that this RPC supports.

pagination.description: Limitations on the block range/age that can be queried.

maxRequests.description: The maximum number of requests to attempt before failing.

baseRetryMs.description: The base retry delay in milliseconds.

retry.description: Default retry settings to be used by a provider such as MultiProvider.

grpcUrls.description: For cosmos chains only, a list of gRPC API URLs

from.description: The block to start any indexing from.

isTestnet.description: Whether the chain is considered a testnet or a mainnet.

logoURI.description: A URI to a logo image for this chain for use in user interfaces.

name.description: The unique string identifier of the chain, used as the key in ChainMap dictionaries.

nativeToken.description: The metadata of the native token of the chain (e.g. ETH for Ethereum).

protocol.description: The type of protocol used by this chain. See ProtocolType for valid values.

restUrls.description: For cosmos chains only, a list of Rest API URLs

rpcUrls.description: The list of RPC endpoints for interacting with the chain.

technicalStack.description: The technical stack of the chain. See ChainTechnicalStack for valid values.

transactionOverrides.description: Properties to include when forming transaction requests.
